input_korean: 휴가철에 드라이빙하면서 듣는 시원하고 상쾌한 노래
english_text_from_agent1: Listening to cool and refreshing songs while driving during the summer season.
merged_sentence: Sun-drenched asphalt blurred into a shimmering haze as cool melodies washed over the open car window, each note a fleeting echo of summer’s endless, golden afternoon.
Sun-drenched and shimmering with nostalgia, summer songs blurred into a golden haze, each note a fleeting echo of endless, serene afternoons drifting through an open window.
